# The MVS Spec

## Resources

The MVS (MolViewSpec) specification is maintained across several repositories and resources:

- **Canonical Specification**: The [OpenAPI.json](https://github.com/molstar/molstar/blob/master/docs/mvs/OpenAPI.json) file in the Mol* repository serves as the canonical specification
- **GitHub Repository**: [molstar/molstar](https://github.com/molstar/molstar) - Main Mol* repository containing the MVS implementation
- **Documentation**: [Mol* MVS Documentation](https://molstar.org/mol-view-spec/) - Comprehensive documentation and examples
- **Library**: Reference implementations and libraries are available in the Mol* ecosystem
